Description:
Preforms inspection and test according to defined criteria as per ITP
Prepares and issues request for inspection 
Maintains results of inspection and test and all controlled documents files
Issues INCR to non-conforming products and services as required
Conducts and documents process and system audits through the use of standard written procedures
Evaluate project quality-related problems and make initial recommendation for possible corrective action
Maintain the QC records all the time
Site surveillance, pro active approach on site
Monitoring the material status for inspections
Proper reporting to superiors, conducting quality tool box talk on site.
Review reposts from client, testing agency   Skills
Skills:
High school graduate or equivalent education
Overall 5 years of work experience
Minimum of 3 years in inspection specialty and 2 years under contract scope of work
CBT approval (recommended) under Civil discipline for inspection
